segments.text: I glance at the kitchen with its angled view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying, towel bunched around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her element, apron on, dress swaying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unseen by her, the sink overflows relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens at her feet, silent threat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a lovely garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in the day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the boy's stool teeters dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs cookies, plate in other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: So risky, that height on such a flimsy stand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below reaches up, eager for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret adventure delights me, but worries too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage and potential fallsâ€”it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy outside contrasts the brewing storm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope awareness comes before calamity strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR
